resources.string: "Always accidentally switching your ringer volume while you just want to lower the volume before you start e.g. youtube? This app sets the music stream as the default audio stream to change by the volume buttons. E.g. on home screen or in apps which don't explicitly set a stream. Tested on Node 4 running Lollipop (Wanam Lite V3.1). Should run an all Lollipop, Kitkat and Jellybean Roms."
After you made your changes, a reboot is required in order for the changes to take effect.
Pressing volume keys shows music volume panel
Pressing volume keys shows ringer volume panel
Debug information is shown in the Xposed Log
Debug information is not shown in the Xposed Log
Compatibility mode for LG devices, only needed on stock KitKat roms
Audio Stream Music Default is released under the GPLv3 license.
